attributes.action: Save ST Joseph's Primary school Milngavie from closure.
attributes.background: ST Joseph's Primary School in Milngavie is a catholic primary school in the heart of Milngavie. The school has a real family atmosphere, parents and the local community support the school and do not wish to see it closed and children being bused or travelling outwit have the local area

rejection.details: Education is devolved in Scotland. You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
